user_query: I'm looking for companies similar to Google based on their website. Can you provide me with a list of related companies? I'm also interested in finding companies related to search engines and online advertising.

TaskList.description: Research and gather a list of companies similar to Google based on analysis of their websites.
Analyze the gathered company data to identify similarities and categorize them.
Retrieve a separate list of companies that are related to search engines.
Retrieve a separate list of companies that are related to online advertising.
Compile and summarize all findings into a comprehensive list of companies.
